settings.title: EB5 Preferred City Commuter
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series returns to our roots, celebrating our tradition of expertise in urban commuting. With its advanced lighting configuration and breakthrough features, it heralds a new era of safe and convenient urban travel.

settings.title: Design
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series is innovative in both style and function, seamlessly integrating aesthetics and utility through its unique lighting setup (including turn signals, brake lights, rear tail lights, and front headlights). Its lighting system is designed for high performance, enhancing visibility and safety during night rides, ensuring seamless navigation in urban environments.

settings.title: Craftsmanship
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series is meticulously crafted, with attention to detail and precision, reflecting our unwavering commitment to quality and innovation. Every component is rigorously designed to deliver a bicycle that not only meets but exceeds the expectations of urban commuters.

settings.title: Finished Product
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series represents the pinnacle of excellent urban commuting. With its cutting-edge features and stylish design, it seamlessly integrates safety, convenience, and performance. Ride confidently and elegantly with the EB5 Roamer series, rediscovering the essence of urban commuting in an unparalleled way.

settings.title: EstablishmentÔºöSpecially designed for off - road adventures.
settings.content: The adventurous off-road genes of jasionbike were born with X-Hunter, defining what a bicycle can achieve in adventure and off-roading. It symbolizes jasionbike's bold innovation. X-Hunter integrates sports and leisure, allowing consumers to adapt perfectly to any scene. It represents rugged durability and unparalleled performance, urging you to embark on new paths and embrace the thrill of the unknown.

settings.heading:
85Nm High Torque
Folding Fat Tire E-Bike

settings.text: The X-Hunter is more than just an electric bike; it's your adventure companion. Seamlessly blending ultimate performance and durability, it opens the door to a world of off-road adventure.
The X-Hunter is more than just an electric bike; it's your adventure companion. Seamlessly blending ultimate performance and durability, it opens the door to a world of off-road adventure.

Powered by a 1200W motor with up to 60Nm torque in just 2 seconds at gear 5, it accelerates swiftly for climbing steep slopes. The sine wave controller ensures smooth, quiet operation with flexible 5-level speed adjustment for a comfortable, personalized ride.

Powered by Samsung SDI's advanced 18650 cells (48V 11A), this spring-loaded, quick-release battery is IPX6 waterproof and internationally certified for flame and explosion resistance‚Äîensuring safe, easy charging or replacement on the go.

X-Hunter features a manually adjustable front fork and four-link suspension system for enhanced shock absorption and load distribution. With a maximum capacity of 330 lbs, it ensures a smooth, stable ride across snow, rough roads, and mountain trails.
Jasion Bike‚Äôs advanced multi-stage quick-disassembly design allows for tool-free, fast breakdown of components‚Äîideal for easy transport and storage.

settings.title: Dual Shock Saddle
settings.content: The X-Hunter saddle features dual shock absorption, measuring 11" L x 10" W x 3.15" H, ensuring a smooth ride.
settings.author: RVdaydream

settings.title: 20" x 4" Puncture-Resistant Tires
settings.content: The high-quality fat tires provide extra protection against punctures from thorns, glass, and other small materials.
settings.author: RVdaydream

settings.title: Full Supension System
settings.content: Equipped with front fork and four-link suspension, it effectively absorbs most bumps and vibrations for a smooth ride.
settings.author: RVdaydream

settings.title: Shimano 7-Speed
settings.content: The Shimano 7-speed gearbox offers seamless shifting, while the motorcycle-style hand-twist Throttle provides easy control.
settings.author: RVdaydream

settings.title: Dual Disc Brake System
settings.content: The front and rear 160mm disc brakes provide precise stopping power and quick response whether in wet or dry conditions.
settings.author: RVdaydream

settings.title: Headlight&Taillight
settings.content: The LED headlight illuminates your path, while the integrated tail light flashes when braking, serving as a nighttime signal.
settings.author: RVdaydream

settings.title: Foldable Electric Bike
settings.content: This e-bike fits easily into compact spaces like apartments, subways, or car trunk, making it perfect for camping and short trips.
settings.author: RVdaydream

settings.title: 1. What's your shipping policy?
settings.text:
Jasion has suspended local pick-up services in the United States. If pick-up services are resumed, we will update the information on our website. Please check the website for updates.

We provide UPS, USPS, and FedEx shipping services. We DO NOT ship to PO BOXES.

In-stock orders typically ship within 2 business days, unless otherwise noted on the product page. Please allow 5-7 business days for your shipment to arrive at your address. Any delivery dates provided by JASION are estimates.

For more shipping information, send an email to support@Jasionbike.com. We will get back to you in 24 hours.

Want to know more about shipping policies, please check more details on our Shipping Policy Page.

settings.title: 2. What's your warranty policy?
settings.text:
All JASION bikes carry a one(1) year warranty from the date of receipt of the bike for manufacturing defects in materials and/or workmanship( all free accessories are not covered).

We will replace any component that is defective or damaged in materials and/or workmanship( including the damage in the processing of shipment).

Before making a warranty claim, we suggest that you first contact us at support@jasionbike.com.

Want to know more about warranty policies, please check more details on our Warranty Policy Page.

settings.title: 3.¬†What's your return&refund policy?
settings.text:
We provide exchange service within 14 days. If the product is defective or damaged, Send damaged photos or videos to customer service within 14 days after receiving the goods, and the damaged parts can be replaced or compensated. We will cover the return (exchange) shipping costs.

In the case of non-quality returns, the customer will be responsible for the return shipping costs.

You can always contact us for any return questions at support@jasionbike.com.

settings.title: 4.¬†Does my height suit X-Hunter?
settings.text: The recommended rider height is 5'3" to 6'4".

settings.title: 5.¬†How long does it take to fully charge the battery?
settings.text: It will take 5-7 hours.

settings.title: 6.¬†How long will it take for my shipment to arrive?
settings.text: Generally, your order will be shipped within one business day after the order is placed, and package shipping will take approximately 3-5 days.

settings.title: 7. Does my Jasion ebike come pre-assembled?
settings.text: Your e-bike arrives 85% assembled. There are just a few pieces to put into place once you take the bike out of the box. For unboxing and setup instructions, please follow the guides on our YouTube Channel.

settings.title: 8. What is the maximum speed of each PAS level?
settings.text:
PAS1 Top speed 16mph

PAS2 Top speed 18mph

PAS3 Top speed 20mph

PAS4 Top speed 23mph

PAS5 Top speed 30+mph
